mapper.select: SELECT supply_id supplyId, min_order minOrder, max_order maxOrder, unit_price unitPrice FROM supply.t_pn_price WHERE supply_id = #{supplyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY supplyId, minOrder
mapper.insert:
insert into supply.t_pn_price (supply_id, min_order, max_order, unit_price, creator ) values
